name: Movie Quest
description:
Remember the times at the movies? Maybe you've got friends all over the world or want to take your hot E-Girl on a date? How will you get together to watch a movie? With Movie Quest you can! Settle down and watch an action flick, quest, roleplay, challenge each other to get through a horror show! But wait, there's more - level up, play in the arcade for prizes, throw popcorn, eat pizza, even work in the movie theater with multiple classes of characters like movie theater manager.

Features:

  • Watch real movies (Mostly older non-copyright remastered movies)
  • Rpg Elements like leveling, questing, items, idle experience.
  • Take part in Daily Quests, movie themed quests and a story rich main questline
  • Play Flappy Happy in the arcade and turn in your quest tokens for prizes
  • Roleplay and socialize
  • Multiple characters and classes to choose from
